title: Ziet Coke 1/21: Diet Coke, Bernie Sanders, #BidenErasedWomen, InstaCart, Wardell
itunes:title: Ziet Coke 1/21: Diet Coke, Bernie Sanders, #BidenErasedWomen, InstaCart, Wardell
description:
On this edition of Ziet Coke Jack and Miles discuss Joe Biden getting rid of the Diet Coke button in the Oval Office, the Bernie Sanders memes are still flying, TERFs are saying Biden's Progressive ideas regarding Trans rights and the rights of Trans Women are "erasing women", InstaCart is firing every employee that wanted to unionize, and apparently Steph Curry's real first name is Wardell.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
